HotelElement.Name: Glen Eden Beach Resort Sunshine Coast

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Glen Eden Beach Resort in Peregian Beach (Noosa), you'll be within the vicinity of Sunshine Beach Village Shops and Ed Webb Park. This 4-star apartment is within the vicinity of Coolum Beach and Noosa National Park.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 32 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. Rooms have private balconies or patios. 32-inch LCD televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as microwaves and coffee/tea makers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a sauna. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and an arcade/game room.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include luggage storage and a library. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Sunshine Beach Village Shops - 6.6 km / 4.1 mi
Ed Webb Park - 6.7 km / 4.2 mi
Coolum Beach - 7.3 km / 4.5 mi
Noosa National Park - 8.1 km / 5 mi
Noosa Beach - 8.9 km / 5.5 mi
Noosa Marina - 9.8 km / 6.1 mi
Mt Coolum Golf Club - 11.6 km / 7.2 mi
Eumundi Market - 14.7 km / 9.1 mi
Ginger Factory - 17 km / 10.5 mi

Sunshine Plaza - 21.1 km / 13.1 mi
Mooloolaba Beach - 24.1 km / 15 mi
Underwater World Sea Life - 24.4 km / 15.2 mi
Big Pineapple - 25.5 km / 15.8 mi

The preferred airport for Glen Eden Beach Resort is Maroochydore, QLD (MCY-Sunshine Coast) - 15.7 km / 9.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
